Class List

Berikut daftar class yang disediakan BshadeUI, enjoy!

  • LAYOUTS
  • Display - {display}
  • Overflow - overflow-{name}
  • Visibility - {visibility}
  • BACKGROUND
  • Background Color - bg-{colorName}-{level}
  • TYPOGRAPHY
  • Text Color - color-{colorName}-{level}
  • Font Family - font-{family}
  • Font Weight - fw-{size}
  • Text Size - text-{size}
  • Text Align - text-{direction}
  • Text Decoration Line - text-decoration-{line}
  • Text Decoration Style - decoration-{style}
  • Text Decoration Color - decoration-{color}
  • FLEXBOX
  • Flex Flow - flow-{name}
  • Flex Direction - direction-{direction}
  • Justify Content - justify-content-{name}
  • Justify Self - justify-self-{name}
  • Justify Items - justify-items-{name}
  • Align Content - align-content-{name}
  • Align Self - align-self-{name}
  • Align Items - align-items-{name}
  • Flexbox Row - row
  • Flexbox Col - col-{size}
  • GRID
  • Grid Template Columns - grid-cols-{maxColumn}
  • Grid Template Rows - grid-rows-{maxRpws}
  • Grid Column - colspan-{size}
  • Grid Auto Flow Col - grid-flow-col
  • Grid Auto Flow Row - grid-flow-row
  • Gap - gap-{size}
  • SPACING
  • Padding - p{direction}-{size}
  • Margin - m{direction}-{size}
  • SIZING
  • Height - h-{size}
  • Width - w-{size}
  • BORDERS
  • Border Width - border-{size}
  • Border Style - border-{style}
  • Border Color - border-{colorName}-{level}
  • Border Radius - radius-{size}
  • EFFECTS
  • Box Shadow - shadow
  • Box Shadow X/Y - shadow-{x|y}-{size}
  • Box Shadow Color - shadow-{colorName}-{level}
  • Box Shadow Blur - shadow-blur-{size}
  • Text Shadow - tshadow
  • Text Shadow X/Y - tshadow-{x|y}-{size}
  • Text Shadow Color - tshadow-{colorName}-{level}
  • Text Shadow Blur - tshadow-blur-{size}
  • OUTLINE
  • Outline Style - outline-{style}
  • Outline Width - outline-{size}
  • Outline Color - outline-{colorName}-{level}
  • INTERACTIVITY
  • Cursor - cursor-{name}
